description: W01 files are located in the \​SamsungRecovery\​ directory. The files are saved in a proprietary format and can only be opened and restored with the Samsung Recovery software used to create them.
NOTE: Samsung Recovery was originally called Recovery Solution but changed to Recovery with the release of version 6, which followed version 5.6.

common_filenames.description: user1.w01 - The name of the backup file that contains a state backup. The next file will be named user1.w02 , then user1.w03 , and so on.
user1.w01 - The name of the backup file that contains a state backup. The next file will be named user1.w02 , then user1.w03 , and so on.
user1.w01 - The name of the backup file that contains a state backup. The next file will be named user1.w02 , then user1.w03 , and so on.
init.w01 - The name of the backup that contains the factory image (formerly called initial image), which is an image used to restore the computer's original factory firmware and settings.
